verses.verse: Whoever loves<WH157> correction<WH4148> loves<WH157> knowledge,<WH1847> but he who hates<WH8130> reproof<WH8433> is stupid.<WH1198>
A good<WH2896> man shall obtain<WH6329> favor<WH7522> from Yahweh,<WH3068> but he will condemn<WH7561> a man<WH376> of wicked devices.<WH4209>
A man<WH120> shall not be established<WH3559> by wickedness,<WH7562> but the root<WH8328> of the righteous<WH6662> shall not be moved.<WH4131>
A worthy<WH2428> woman<WH802> is the crown<WH5850> of her husband,<WH1167> but a disgraceful<WH954> wife is as rottenness<WH7538> in his bones.<WH6106>
The thoughts<WH4284> of the righteous<WH6662> are just,<WH4941> but the advice of the wicked<WH7563> is deceitful.<WH4820>
The words<WH1697> of the wicked<WH7563> are about lying in wait<WH693> for blood,<WH1818> but the speech<WH6310> of the upright<WH3477> rescues them.<WH5337>
The wicked<WH7563> are overthrown,<WH2015> and are no more,<WH1004> but the house of the righteous<WH6662> shall stand.<WH5975>
A man<WH376> shall be commended<WH1984> according<WH6310> to his wisdom,<WH7922> but he who has a warped mind<WH3820> shall be despised.<WH937>
Better<WH2896> is he who is lightly esteemed,<WH7034> and has a servant,<WH5650> than he who honors<WH3513> himself,<WH2638> and lacks bread.<WH3899>
A righteous<WH6662> man respects<WH3045> the life<WH5315> of his animal,<WH929> but the tender mercies<WH7356> of the wicked<WH7563> are cruel.<WH394>
He who tills<WH5647> his land<WH127> shall have plenty<WH7646> of bread,<WH3899> but he who chases<WH7291> fantasies<WH7386> is void<WH2638> of understanding.<WH3820>
The wicked<WH7563> desires<WH2530> the plunder<WH4685> of evil<WH7451> men,<WH8328> but the root of the righteous<WH6662> flourishes.<WH5414>
An evil<WH7451> man is trapped<WH4170> by sinfulness<WH6588> of lips,<WH8193> but the righteous<WH6662> shall come out<WH3318> of trouble.<WH6869>
A man<WH376> shall be satisfied<WH7646> with good<WH2896> by the fruit<WH6529> of his mouth.<WH6310> The work<WH1576> of a man<WH120>'s hands<WH3027> shall be rewarded to him.<WH7725>
The way<WH1870> of a fool<WH191> is right<WH3477> in his own eyes,<WH5869> but he who is wise<WH2450> listens<WH8085> to counsel.<WH6098>
A fool<WH191> shows<WH3045> his annoyance<WH3708> the same day,<WH3117> but one who overlooks<WH3680> an insult<WH7036> is prudent.<WH6175>
He who is truthful<WH530> testifies<WH6315> honestly,<WH6664> <WH5046> but a false<WH8267> witness<WH5707> lies.<WH4820>
There is<WH3426> one who speaks<WH981> rashly like the piercing<WH4094> of a sword,<WH2719> but the tongue<WH3956> of the wise<WH2450> heals.<WH4832>
Truth<WH571>'s lips<WH8193> will be established<WH3559> forever,<WH5703> but a lying<WH8267> tongue<WH3956> is only momentary.<WH7280>
Deceit<WH4820> is in the heart<WH3820> of those who plot<WH2790> evil,<WH7451> but joy<WH8057> comes to the promoters<WH3289> of peace.<WH7965>
No mischief<WH205> shall happen<WH579> to the righteous,<WH6662> but the wicked<WH7563> shall be filled<WH4390> with evil.<WH7451>
Lying<WH8267> lips<WH8193> are an abomination<WH8441> to Yahweh,<WH3068> but those who do<WH6213> the truth<WH530> are his delight.<WH7522>
A prudent<WH6175> man<WH120> keeps<WH3680> his knowledge,<WH1847> but the hearts<WH3820> of fools<WH3684> proclaim<WH7121> foolishness.<WH200>
The hands<WH3027> of the diligent<WH2742> ones shall rule,<WH4910> but laziness<WH7423> ends in slave labor.<WH4522>
Anxiety<WH1674> in a man<WH376>'s heart<WH3820> weighs it down,<WH7812> but a kind<WH2896> word<WH1697> makes it glad.<WH8055>
A righteous<WH6662> person is cautious<WH8446> in friendship,<WH7453> but the way<WH1870> of the wicked<WH7563> leads them astray.<WH7563>
The slothful<WH7423> man doesn't<WH2760> roast his game,<WH6718> but the possessions<WH1952> of diligent<WH2742> men<WH120> are prized.<WH3368>
In the way<WH734> of righteousness<WH6666> is life;<WH2416> in its path<WH5410> there is no death.<WH4194>
